products.name: Rosa Islamic Kids Prayer Wear
products.description: Designed for children, this two-piece prayer wear collection from Qibla is crafted from high-quality, breathable fabric to ensure maximum comfort during your little ones daily prayers. The vibrant colors and delightful designs bring a fun and lively touch to the Isdal. This essential prayer outfit offers both style and ease of movement, making it a perfect addition to any child's wardrobe. It also comes with a special bag for easy carrying to the Masjid.
